original_text: Here is the account of how he rebelled against the king: Solomon had built the terraces and had filled in the gap in the wall of the city of David his father.
korean_text: 그가 손을 들어 왕을 대적하는 까닭은 이러하니라 솔로몬이 밀로를 건축하고 그의 아버지 다윗의 성읍이 무너진 것을 수축하였는데

sentences.original_text: of how he rebelled against the king
and had filled in the gap
in the wall of the city of David his father
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗 성의 벽에 있는
